title: A plea to riot from a Disabled gamer and long time fan
body:
I have been severely physically disabled for the last few years and noticed riot's attention to representing diversity through their heroes. Little girls, men of colour and most recently with the addition of Jhin, an openly homosexual Attack damage carry. What I propose is a hero that can represent me and the other mobility limited players who enjoy this great game.

Riot, I know you'll do the right thing, God bless :)
